entry.title: WIND WARNING, Esther

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of showers later this evening. Showers beginning near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 60 gusting to 90 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
